import { useState } from 'react'; const FinancialDataComponent = (props) => { const [change, setChange] = useState({changeActive: false, changeCapital: false, changeLiability: false, changeEbitda: false, changeLoss: false, changeIncomeTax: false, changePropertyTax: false, changeDividend1: false, changeDividend2: false}); const activeChange = (e) => { props.setActive(e.target.value); setChange({changeActive: true, changeCapital: change.changeCapital, changeLiability: change.changeLiability, changeEbitda: change.changeEbitda, changeLoss: change.changeLoss, changeIncomeTax: change.changeIncomeTax, changePropertyTax: change.changePropertyTax, changeDividend1: change.changeDividend1, changeDividend2: change.changeDividend1}) } const capitalChange = (e) => { props.setCapital(e.target.value); } const liabilityChange = (e) => { props.setLiability(e.target.value); } const ebitdaChange = (e) => { props.setEBITDA(e.target.value); } const lossChange = (e) => { props.setLoss(e.target.value); } const incomeTaxChange = (e) => { props.setIncomeTax(e.target.value); } const propertyTaxChange = (e) => { props.setPropertyTax(e.target.value); } const dividend1Change = (e) => { props.setDividend1(e.target.value); } const dividend2Change = (e) => { props.setDividend2(e.target.value); } return (

); }; export default FinancialDataComponent;
